amendment.description: Amendment increases funding in the Environmental Protection Agency's Environmental Programs and Management account by $550,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
